titleStmt.title: A declaration and offer of duty by the kingdom of Scotland, with an annexation of the excise to the crown. Edinburgh, April 28, 1685.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: At head: royal seal with initial "J R".
Imperfect: stained, tightly bound with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
